type: invitation to apply with qualifactions (itaq) or request for proposal (rfp)
short_summary: the solicitation is a request for responses to a request for proposal (rfp) from experienced commercial fishing vessels operators who can provide a range of services to the department of fisheries and oceans. the rfp addresses the procurement of several services related to commercial fisheries management, including:
description: The Pacific Herring Survey will be conducted for the purpose of fulfilling the mandatory requirement of herring spawn deposition data prior to commencing the 2023 fishing season. This survey would be an active operation conducted between January 2023 and January 2024 in regions of British Columbainain and mainland areas not inclusivity Canadian,
